description: This is a 3 bedroom 2 full bathroom apartment occupied by fun, professional, 20 something siblings. the apartment is located 1 block off the 46th and broadway subway stop, and only 15 minutes to midtown NY.  7 minutes to LGA. One room available as of march 1st.
name: ONE BDRM Astoria Apt
review: So close to the subway and Dan and Jessie were great! The room was perfect for me and my sister and the place was quiet and nice. I'd definitely stay here the next time I come to New York!
